metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42530 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
XMP Toolkit SDK version 2021.07 (and earlier) is affected by a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation requires user interaction in that a victim must open a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-42530` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1
libexempi3 - 2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed in adobe's 2021.08 code drop

criterions.comment: exempi package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1').
